title: Slow cooker pork chops
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '5 boneless pork chops', '1 onion, sliced', '2 green peppers, sliced', '225ml tomato passata or sieved tomatoes', '50g brown sugar, or to taste', '1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt, or to taste', '2 tablespoons cornflour (optional)']
